name: Mix It! (itch)
description:
An endless runner game developed by The3AMWorkshop for the Game Jam +

The topics selected are: Color and Paint & Short and Addictive, we are as well using the Educational category to teach players about the chromatic circle.

"The monster known as Kuro is seeking to suck all the color out of the universe to feed on. The Color Mixers' goal is to bring color back to the galaxy, so they are now under Kuro's watchful eye."

Drag your mouse up and down in order to move your ship, add or substract colors to match the paths available and continue your travel.
